The higher the level is, the life of your hero increases!
Higher level provides more demage made by a character using standard attack and special attack. That rule includes healing skills too.
This skill will make your character rally tough! Enemies will have more troubles with hurting your character.
Run into your enemy and shock them! Higher levels fastens regeneration of the attack, lenghten the time of the shock, speed of the run and of course demage.
Hero attacks all enemies at once in reach. Higher levels fastens the regeneration of the attack, speed of attack and increase the demage.
Dangerous roar, which stuns all the enemies. Higher levels lenghten the effect and fastens loading and performing of the attack.
Strong attack causes high demages to one enemy. Higher levels increase demage, fastens regeneration of the spell.
Black orb, which hurts enemies in reach of the explosion. Higher levels increase the area and level of demages, fastens the regeneration of the spell.
Global attack hurts all of the enemies! Higher levels increase demages and fastens the time of regeneration and casting the spell.

Heals all of companions in reach of the spell with bigger strength. It\'s worth to take care of yourself! Higher levels increase gaining life points, also the reange, regeneration and speed of casting a spell.
Troubles with coming horde? This spell will shock them for some time. Higher levels increase the range of the spell, fastens its regeneration and its casting.
Massive heal. There\'s no need to coming over! Higher levels increase the number of restored health points and fastens regeneration time and fastens the spell casting.
